controllers

Class CheckinController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.CheckinController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class CheckinController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to check patients in into the hospital. If you would like to register a new patient, please use the register patient file controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckinController(LoginController loginController)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkIn(PatientFileIN patientFile)
      Use this method to check in a patient with an existing patient file.
      java.util.Collection<PatientFileIN> getAllPatientFiles()
      Use this method to display a list of the possible patients that can be checked in into this hospital.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckinController

        @PUBLICAPI
public CheckinController(LoginController loginController)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        loginController - The logincontroller of the user that wants to check a patient in into the hospital.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the user to whom the given login controller belongs is not a Nurse or if the login controller is invalid for any other reason.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        See Also:
        NeedsLoginController, HospitalController

    • Method Detail

      • checkIn

        @PUBLICAPI
public void checkIn(PatientFileIN patientFile)
        Use this method to check in a patient with an existing patient file.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidPatientFileException - If the given patient file is not registered in the hospital, or is already checked in.

      • getAllPatientFiles

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<PatientFileIN> getAllPatientFiles()
        Use this method to display a list of the possible patients that can be checked in into this hospital.
